condition.ab: Light brown large papyrus written with a thin pen in dark black ink perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The ink has disappeared in some places. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides.

handDesc.p: There are some diacritical dots. Ibn is written with initial alif several times in this letter (lines 5, 10).
